panels.description: To help you find rule name and validate the connection

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Rules
JOIN
    Providers ON Rules.providerId = Providers.ID
WHERE
    Providers.name = 'kubernetes';

panels.title: Retrieved Kubernetes Rules

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    '${CPULimit}' AS "CPU Limit Total",
    '${CPURequest}' AS "CPU Request Total"

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS "Memory Limit Total",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS "Memory Request Total",
    Scans.created_at AS "Latest Update"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    AND Scans.created_at = (
        SELECT MAX(Scans.created_at)
        FROM Scans
        JOIN Resources ON Scans.resourceId = Resources.ID
        JOIN Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
        WHERE
            Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
            AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    );

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS "CPU Usage",
    Scans.created_at AS "Time",
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at;

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS "Memory Usage",
    Scans.created_at AS "Time",
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at;

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS "CPU Usage",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS "CPU Limit",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPURequestTotal' AS "CPU Request",
    Scans.created_at AS "Time",
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at;

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS "Memory Usage",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryLimitTotal' AS "Memory Limit",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryRequestTotal' AS "Memory Request",
    Scans.created_at AS "Time",
    Rules.name AS rule_name
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at;

SELECT
    MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Min Usage",
    AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Avg Usage",
    MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Max Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}';

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Scans.error = true
    AND
    (Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}')
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

SELECT
    MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Min Usage",
    AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Avg Usage",
    MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Max Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}';

SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Scans.error = true
    AND
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

SELECT
    MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Min Usage",
    MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Max Usage",
    AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPUUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Avg Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}';

SELECT
    MIN(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Min Usage",
    MAX(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Max Usage",
    AVG(CAST(Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage' AS NUMERIC)) AS "Avg Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}';

SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace' AS "Namespace",
    Rules.name AS "Rule Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}' OR Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'name' AS "Name",
    Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace' AS "Namespace",
    Rules.name AS "Rule Name",
    Scans.created_at AS "Scan time"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}' OR Rules.name = '${MemoryRule}'
ORDER BY
    Scans.created_at
DESC;

SELECT 
    COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE s.error = true) AS "Error Count",
    MAX(s.created_at) AS "Latest Created At"
FROM
    Scans s
JOIN 
    Rules r ON s.ruleId = r.ID
WHERE 
    s.error = true
    AND (r.name = '${CpuRule}' OR r.name = '${MemoryRule}')
GROUP BY 
    s.batchId
ORDER BY 
    "Latest Created At" DESC;

panels.title: Scan by scan bars with amount of peakk alert

targets.rawSql:
WITH HourlyUsage AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at) AS "Hour",
        SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::numeric) AS "Total Memory Usage"
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    GROUP BY
        EXTRACT(HOUR FROM Scans.created_at)
)
SELECT
    "Hour"
FROM
    HourlyUsage
ORDER BY
    "Total Memory Usage" DESC
LIMIT 1;

WITH WeeklyUsage AS (
    SELECT
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at) AS "DayOfWeek",
        SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::numeric) AS "Total Memory Usage"
    FROM
        Resources
    JOIN
        Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
    JOIN
        Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
    WHERE
        Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
        AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    GROUP BY
        EXTRACT(DOW FROM Scans.created_at)
)
SELECT
    CASE "DayOfWeek"
        WHEN 0 THEN 'Sunday'
        WHEN 1 THEN 'Monday'
        WHEN 2 THEN 'Tuesday'
        WHEN 3 THEN 'Wednesday'
        WHEN 4 THEN 'Thursday'
        WHEN 5 THEN 'Friday'
        WHEN 6 THEN 'Saturday'
    END AS "Peak Day of Week"
FROM
    WeeklyUsage
ORDER BY
    "Total Memory Usage" DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', Scans.created_at) + INTERVAL '1 minute' * (FLOOR(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM Scans.created_at) / 30) * 30) AS "30 Minute Interval",
    SUM((Resources.content::jsonb->>'MemoryUsage')::numeric) AS "Total Memory Usage"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
GROUP BY
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', Scans.created_at) + INTERVAL '1 minute' * (FLOOR(EXTRACT(MINUTE FROM Scans.created_at) / 30) * 30)
ORDER BY
    "30 Minute Interval";

panels.title: Memory Usage Per hour (avg on all data)

targets.rawSql: SELECT batchid FROM scans LIMIT 50

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' AS "Pod Name"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
        Resources.content::jsonb->'metadata'->>'namespace'='$Namespace'
ORDER BY
   Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName'
ASC;

list.definition:
SELECT
    Resources.content::jsonb->>'CPULimitTotal' AS "CPU Limit Total"
FROM
    Resources
JOIN
    Scans ON Resources.ID = Scans.resourceId
JOIN
    Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
WHERE
    Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
    AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    AND Scans.created_at = (
        SELECT MAX(Scans.created_at)
        FROM Scans
        JOIN Resources ON Scans.resourceId = Resources.ID
        JOIN Rules ON Scans.ruleId = Rules.ID
        WHERE
            Rules.name = '${CpuRule}'
            AND Resources.content::jsonb->>'podName' = '${Pod}'
    );
